title.en: Wellness and Spa Service Case Study and Analysis

description.en: Completion of an independent practical research work and its defence.
description.et: Iseseisva erialase praktilise kallakuga uurimistöö (kaasusanalüüsi) koostamine ja kaitsmine.

objectives.en: The aim of the subject is to demonstrate the knowledge, skills of research compilation and communication of the results.
objectives.et: Õppeaine läbimisega demonstreerib üliõpilane omandatud teadmisi ning uurimistöö koostamise ja kaitsmise oskusi.

learning_outcomes.en: Upon the completion of the course the student:
1)	is able to compile a specialised practical research work in accordance with research requirements;
learning_outcomes.et: 1)	oskab koostada uurimistööle esitatavatele nõuetele vastavat praktilise kallakuga erialast uurimistööd;

learning_outcomes.en: 2) is able to identify and formulate research problems and questions and find appropriate information for their analysis;
learning_outcomes.et: 2) oskab määratleda ja formuleerida uurimisprobleeme ja küsimusi ning leida nende käsitlemiseks vajalikku informatsiooni;

learning_outcomes.en: 3) is able to apply various research methods depending on the work objective and research tasks;
learning_outcomes.et: 3) oskab rakendada erinevaid uurimismeetodeid töö eesmärgist ja uurimisülesannetest lähtuvalt;

learning_outcomes.en: 4) can analyse collected information and data and interpret research results;
learning_outcomes.et: 4) oskab analüüsida kogutud informatsiooni ja andmeid ning sisuliselt tõlgendada uuringu tulemusi;

learning_outcomes.en: 5) uses correct terms and knows formal rules of written research work;
learning_outcomes.et: 5) kasutab korrektselt termineid ning tunneb kirjaliku uurimistöö vormistusreegleid;

learning_outcomes.en: 6) is able to formulate conclusions and suggestions of the conducted analysis;
7) has correct oral and written communication skills and is able to present his/her views in defence discussion.
learning_outcomes.et: 7) oskab korrektselt väljenduda nii kirjalikult kui suuliselt ning on suuteline esitama ja kaitsma diskussioonis oma uurimistöös esitatud seisukohti.

description.en: Methodology (Justification for case study and methods used)
description.et: Methodology (Justification for case study and methods used)

description.en: Final Formatting (Putting the whole Report together)
description.et: Final Formatting (Putting the whole Report together)

description.en: Empirical Analysis (Analysis and interpretation of Findings)
description.et: Empirical Analysis (Analysis and interpretation of Findings)

debt_elimination.en: The liquidation of debts is carried out in agreement with the lecturer in accordance with the UT study organization regulations.
debt_elimination.et: The liquidation of debts is carried out in agreement with the lecturer in accordance with the UT study organization regulations.

assessment_scale.et: Eristav (A, B, C, D, E, F, mi)
assessment_scale.en: differentiated (A, B, C, D, E, F, not present)

results_available_from.en: The evaluation results are entered into the learning information system within one day after the final evaluation.
results_available_from.et: The evaluation results are entered into the learning information system within one day after the final evaluation.
